WITH SORTEDBOARD AS ( SELECT BO_NO, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER, BO_DATE, BO_HIT, BO_REC FROM FREEBOARD ORDER BY BO_NO DESC ), RNUMBOARD AS ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, SORTEDBOARD.* FROM SORTEDBOARD ) SELECT * FROM RNUMBOARD
WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT BO_NO, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER, BO_IP, BO_MAIL, BO_PASS, BO_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') BO_DATE, BO_HIT, BO_REC, BO_PARENT FROM FREEBOARD WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET BO_HIT = BO_HIT + 1 WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}
